title: Daily (1) Reminder that Jhin with rageblade is disabled in competitive but not in ranked games.
body:
Getting outplayed from a right click for 2.2k feels fair riot.

How about you disable that item on him or fix this shit ?

https://i.imgur.com/mrMZ6H5.png

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cjG3kCTCHHk

replies.body: How do you know its disabled in pro play

> [{quoted}](name=Akali is SO HOT,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=aP96Rdlj,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-04-23T15:31:11.169+0000)
>
> How do you know he's disabled in pro play

Because it is ? 

How do I prove it if they CANNOT even pick it ?

You and the other ~~moron~~ guy could actually link the casters discussing the fact it was disabled, or even the reddit thread dedicated to discussing it?

https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/8c6vtx/why_is_guinsoo_disabled_for_jhin_in_lck_finals/

Uhm don't you know? 

Reddit is filth here apparently. 
Can't even mention it without being downvoted
Nah, unheard of.
Linking sources to back up your claim is always nice.  Shouldn't just claim something without backing it up :)

There was one Jhin game where the caster announced that Jhin was NOT ALLOWED to build Guinsoo.

Technically, he CAN build it, but will be forced to sell/undo it. But overall, not disabled.
Searching on your own for claims you doubt is also nice.
Burden of proof.

This is where it's called out by PapaSmithy that Jhin was not allowed to buy the Rageblade

https://youtu.be/w5-wWXL_hwg?t=10m11s

This isn't even a complicated thing to fix, I would think.

Just make Rageblade's %AD effect stack additively onto Jhin's own %AD passive _(like Infernal does)_, instead of recursively like it does now.

dude who gives a fuck about 99% of the leauge players , better keep those juciy 1% so the other 99% feel like the game is good and watch the 1% 
but it happens that the 99% are only players not a random spectators who are watching a game that they dont know how to work

> [{quoted}](name=Purgë,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=aP96Rdlj,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2018-04-23T17:52:59.790+0000)
>
> dude who gives a fuck about 99% of the leauge players , better keep those juciy 1% so the other 99% feel like the game is good and watch the 1% 
> but it happens that the 99% are only players not a random spectators who are watching a game that they dont know how to work

But it would make more sense to have it enabled in LCS so we can WATCH IT and let the pros find counters for it!

{{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}
That's good lol, put the OP item into LCS matches, then lets see how badly they wanna keep it unchanged. :P
Remember when Jhin had a gamebreaking bug where if he W'ed you from fog of war, he'd automatically DC the whole enemy team, yet he STILL didn't get disabled?
Riot said, "oh are adcs one shotting you? Dey r now boi!!!!!"

LCK announcers talking about it being disabled in LCK playoffs
[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XdRh-829EH8](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XdRh-829EH8)

> [{quoted}](name=Triistana,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=aP96Rdlj,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2018-04-23T18:16:37.419+0000)
>
> Care to post video? I'd like to see the 2.2k one shot.

[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ETRn0vWoLHA](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ETRn0vWoLHA)

7:40 if you wanna see the craziest it can get. 
Note he crits a 203 armor Cho for 3782. He kills Kaisa in one auto for 3772 and then Nami gets one shot for 2870 with a trap.
you pretty much phrased it like it cant happen so people are showing you that and more
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

Jhin is supposed to be a slow methodical character. at least what riot advertised him as yet he naturally gains attack speed equal to other adcs with statck shiv which completely negates the reason for him having attack speed scaling into anything Ad or movement speed. crit is crit why does it have an ad scaling. why does jhin have movement speed on w and crits anyway
"I'm getting downvoted to hell and my crying is making me look stupid, better run away."
Forgot it was an Echo chamber couple months ago through Adc2k17 lul

Sorry, but I was never part of that. I never thought the class was doing bad back then, and actually enjoyed playing it more during that time. But yeah, that was another example of The Boards behaving in such way. I've lost hope in the idea of this place being somewhere a conversation can be established. Most people only care about posting their own views, rarely listen to others and when there's a big collective thought, going against the current often results in mocks and insults.

I made a new post on this thread at the very top. I have no interest in going any further here. If you wanna talk for real, then sure. If you only wanna rub on my face my mistakes on this thread then I'll stop here.

> [{quoted}](name=Triistana,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=aP96Rdlj,comment-id=00080001000000000000000000000000000000010000,timestamp=2018-04-25T05:36:08.042+0000)
>
> Sorry, but I was never part of that. I never thought the class was doing bad back then, and actually enjoyed playing it more during that time. But yeah, that was another example of The Boards behaving in such way. I've lost hope in the idea of this place being somewhere a conversation can be established. Most people only care about posting their own views, rarely listen to others and when there's a big collective thought, going against the current often results in mocks and insults.
> 
> I made a new post on this thread at the very top. I have no interest in going any further here. If you wanna talk for real, then sure. If you only wanna rub on my face my mistakes on this thread then I'll stop here.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cjG3kCTCHHk

There you go, this was at 1.340~ attack damage and the moment that made me open this topic.

I could probably stamp it later when he was at 2.2k as well.
Thank you. That's what I really wanted to see. It still doesn't excuse my douchey attitude and I'm sorry I behaved that way towards you.

> [{quoted}](name=Triistana,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=aP96Rdlj,comment-id=000800010000,timestamp=2018-04-23T21:31:51.605+0000)
>
> I don't want to see a video of an ex-pro going off in a featured video.
> 
> **I wanna see OP's game where Jhin does this**

Jhin in OP's game has 2249 AD
Bunny has 3158 AD when he crits Kaisa with 84 armor for 3772
2249 is .596% of the AD he Bunny has
2248 Is how much the OP's Jhin would be criting for with IE vs someone with 84Armor
Went to OP.GG and found the game really quickly, you could do the same. Jhin wasn't even full build and had a rapid fire, so bonus on hit damage another 179+ Magic damage on a crit vs the 39 MR the OP has 

2248+179= 2427 total damage OP has 2447 life, but OP also has 80 instead of 84 armor so he would take another 1.3% damage roughly or 29 Damage. 2456 vs 2447 life. OP would literally die in one auto vs a stacked rageblade+Rapidfire proc 

You're just in denial of reality if you don't think a Jhin with a stacked Rageblade can't one auto someone

You're ridiculous. What does it matter if it's Bunny or the OP? It's the same scenario, with PROOF of the one shot. Farther down, BestPudgeNA also posted the math behind the possible one shot. Also, your comment farther down about pro's not playing the same game is idiotic. They are still playing LEAGUE OF LEGENDS, which means that the interactions will be the same. You're just someone who was proven wrong and hates to admit

> [{quoted}](name=Triistana,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=aP96Rdlj,comment-id=00080001000000020000,timestamp=2018-04-24T21:04:56.351+0000)
>
> "Proven wrong"? I've been standing by two very simple points for this _discussion_:
> 1.- This Jhin thing isn't a big issue in the grand scheme of things
> 2.- I just find it funny that OP can't be bothered to even record what happened
> 
> So far, nobody has even cared about proving those wrong.
> 
> Got a question for you: Why doesn't this _"busted"_ strategy dominate the Solo Queue ladder with a super high win ratio that goes with the high play ratio Jhin has?

{{champion:145}}  exists.

Also the recording is on my drive.

You refuse to take it.

> [{quoted}](name=Triistana,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=aP96Rdlj,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2018-04-23T18:16:37.419+0000)
>
> Care to post video? I'd like to see the 2.2k one shot.

I can show you the replay in discord share if you want.

Don't have OBS or anything stream related.

> [{quoted}](name=Triistana,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=aP96Rdlj,comment-id=000800000000,timestamp=2018-04-23T19:04:44.099+0000)
>
> You can grab the replay and post it in any of the sites that let you share webms then share the link here.

I'm not going to bother in that case.

Did you not look at the 2.2k AD Jhin in the picture? Have you not played the game since the Rageblade rework? I don't think Jhin is overpowered, but it's not hard to believe that a squshy champion with somewhere between 1.7k to 2.5k hp getting 1 shot by someone with over 2k AD. You are needlessly arguing at this point. You would have a reason to be in a state of disbelief if he claimed any other champion one shot him with a single auto, but its Jhin.

You can just as easily check to see if it happened or not, but you're going to dance around saying "it didn't happen, pics or didn't happen". You're so childish, it's like you're saying "T-rex never existed, show me a skeleton of one" ; proof is so readily available, the fact that you need it to be hand delivered to you is ridiculous.

Except you cannot have 2 AD on anyone other than Jhin.

Even if you could, they wouldn't be building crit.

2.2k AD x2.25 (IE crit) is most certainly going to one shot any non tank in the game

> [{quoted}](name=Triistana,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=aP96Rdlj,comment-id=000800000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2018-04-23T22:46:54.121+0000)
>
> 1.5K AP Veigar won't have the same effect on 4K HP Cho than on 1.5K HP Syndra.
> 
> All this post does is: OMG I DIED TO JHIN 2.2K AD
> 
> We don't know if they played horribly early and fed him, we don't know if someone on their team had a bad game and Jhin just got fed. Any fed character can two/one shot people with a couple items, and from the number of kills the screenshot has gives the impression for this game to be a really low Elo game, which is a terrible place to get a proper sample. We're given no context. And to top things off he can't even post a video you can capture easily directly in the client? This seems much more like a salt based post rather than anything meaningful. The character isn't even at 50% win ratio in higher Elo. This isn't Feral Flare Warwick, not by a very long shot.

I'll give you the replay file and you can upload it or watch it yourself.

If you don't want it that's absolutely fine.

But I'm not going to visit various websites, download a reorder, record the thing and then upload it so I can prove a complete random and irrelevant stranger on the internet wrong, who also happens to be delusional and clueless about the game.

No its well established you can get a crazy amount of AD with just three items one being rageblade. Auto some creeps and bam.

Your argument just doesnt have any merit to it. Any attempt to label this interaction balanced let alone intended is ridiculous
